dev:remarks.maml:para: Will give the group with DistinguishedName in $UserAdminGroup access to create user objects in the OU with DistinguishedName in $UsersOU and all sub-OUs. Add -NoInheritance do disable inheritance.

maml:description.maml:para: Give DelegateDN rights to join computers in target (usually an OU).
Give DelegateDN rights to join computers in target (usually an OU).
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Allow creating computer objects, this allows to join computers without a pre-staged computer account
Sets access right to "This object only"
Allow creating computer objects, this allows to join computers without a pre-staged computer account
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Sets access right to "This object only"
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Will give the group with DistinguishedName in $JoinDomainAccounts rights to join computers to the domain. Requires a computer account to be created already.

maml:description.maml:para: Delegate rights to link GPO on target (usually an OU)
Delegate rights to link GPO on target (usually an OU)
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Allow or Deny
Sets access right to "This object only"
Allow or Deny
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Sets access right to "This object only"
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Will give the group with DistinguishedName in $GPAdmin rights to link GPOs on the OU with DistinguishedName in $UsersOU and all sub-OUs. Add -NoInheritance to disable inheritance.

maml:description.maml:para: Give Delegate rights to manage members in group(s).
Give Delegate rights to manage members in group(s).
Allow or Deny
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Sets access right to "This object only", use this when TargetDN is a group.
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.
Allow or Deny
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Sets access right to "Children". Use this to effect all groups in OU but not subOUs
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.
Allow or Deny
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Sets access right to "This object only", use this when TargetDN is a group.
Sets access right to "Children". Use this to effect all groups in OU but not subOUs
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Will give the group with DistinguishedName in $AccessAdminGroup access to manage members of any group in the OU with DistinguishedName in $GroupsOU and all sub-OUs. Add -NoInheritance do disable inheritance.
Will give the group with DistinguishedName in $AccessAdminGroup access to manage members of any group in the OU with DistinguishedName in $GroupsOU. Will not effect groups in sub-OUs.
Will give the group with DistinguishedName in $AccessAdminGroup access to manage members of the group in with DistinguishedName in $SpecialGroup.

maml:description.maml:para: Give Delegate rights to groups manager to manage members in group(s). Note that this access stays with the user if the manager changes.
Give Delegate rights to groups manager to manage members in group(s). Note that this access stays with the user if the manager changes.
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Has to be a group.
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Has to be a group.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Will give the current manager of the group in $Group access to manage members. Note that this access stays with the user if the manager changes.

maml:description.maml:para: Delegates right to move object of type ObjectTypeName from TargetDN. Moving also requires create-child rights in target container.
Delegates the rights to rename and delete objects in TargetDN.
Object type to allow being moved
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Sets access right to "This object only"
DistinguishedName of group or user to give permissions to.
Sets access right to "This object only"
Object type to allow being moved
DistinguishedName of object to modify ACL on. Usually an OU.

maml:description.maml:para: Give Delegate "Replicating Directory Changes" rights on domain with DistinguishedName in target

Allow replicating secrets, like passwords (Corresponds to "Replicating Directory Changes All")

dev:remarks.maml:para: Will give the service account with DistinguishedName in $AADCServiceAccount the right "Replicating Directory Changes". Add -AllowReplicateSecrets to grant "Replicating Directory Changes All" instead..

maml:description.maml:para: Sets an Active Directory object as the Owner of an Access Control List (ACL).
The Set-DSACLOwner cmdlet will set the given OwnerDN (Objects Distinguished Name) as Owner of the specified TargetDN (Target Distinguished Name).
The TargetDN parameter specifies what object the modification will execute on.
The OwnerDN parameter specifies what object in Active Directory that will take ownership of the target.
The TargetDN parameter specifies what object the modification will execute on.
The OwnerDN parameter specifies what object in Active Directory that will take ownership of the target.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The OwnerDN parameter specifies what object in Active Directory that will take ownership of the target.
The TargetDN parameter specifies what object the modification will execute on.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.

dev:remarks.maml:para: The following example will set Chew David as owner of the Accounting Organizational Units Access Control List.
